title: Can We Make Dua for Deceased NonMuslims? assimalhakeem JAL
transcript: he's asking if my parents are not Muslims and their diseased can I pray for them unfortunately not in Muslim the prophet once while passing bya which is an area outside of Medina he cried so the companion said why are you crying a prophet of Allah he said I asked Allah to seek forgiveness from my mother and Allah prevented me from doing so and I ask Allah to grant me permission to visit her grave and Allah allowed me to visit her grave and in Surah atba chapter 9 Allah asael stated that it is not permissible for the prophet or to the Believers to ask forgiveness for their relatives relative if they died on shik so this is not permissible and Allah Knows Best
